output_text:
Title: The Forgotten Peak
Introduction: In the heart of the rugged mountains, a young hiker discovers an ancient secret.
Body: As Alex climbed the treacherous trails, the air grew thinner and the views more breathtaking. Suddenly, he stumbled upon an old map etched into a stone. Following it led him to a hidden valley filled with wildflowers and crystal-clear streams.
Conclusion: Returning home, Alex realized that true adventure lies in the unknown, urging others to seek their own peaks.
